title: RICK PERRY AND THE COUNCIL

location.text: Tower Club Dallas on the 48th Floor of Thanksgiving Tower, 1601 Elm St.,  Dallas, TX 75201

body: As Cinco de Mayo arrives, we may not know where former Texas Governor Rick Perry is on his life's journey, but we do know that he has a stop scheduled that day with the World Affairs Council in Dallas.
Texas' longest serving governor will address our luncheon program on Tuesday, May 5, 1:00 PM at the Tower Club Dallas.

The governor's topic has not been announced, but, if headlines are an indication, he will have many subjects from which to choose. (Members of the Council's Global Forum will have an opportunity to visit with Gov. Perry at a reception a half-hour before the program.)
Special thanks to our media sponsor D CEO.
